thread.title: Mrs Freda Skelcher
thread.title_full: Glasses Direct reviewed by Mrs Freda Skelcher

author: Mrs Freda Skelcher
title: Mrs Freda Skelcher
text: I have never been so happy with my new glasses also the customer service has been exceptional and i do not have a bad word to say about the glasses which i have received. I have passed the word round to my friends and family about glasses direct. Thanks again for everything!!
